statements: SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback;
SELECT passenger_name, rating FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM PassengerFeedback;
SELECT passenger_name, comments FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE passenger_name='Alice';
SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY passenger_name DESC;
SELECT passenger_name, rating FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE rating < 2 AND feedback_id > 5;
SELECT feedback_id, passenger_name, comments FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE comments LIKE '%excellent%' OR comments LIKE '%poor%';
SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 AND passenger_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM PassengerFeedback;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table;
SELECT feedback_id, passenger_id, feedback_text, rating, feedback_date FROM feedback_table WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT passenger_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE passenger_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_table WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback_table;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_table WHERE passenger_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM rating_table WHERE overall_rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_table JOIN rating_table ON feedback_table.passenger_id = rating_table.passenger_id;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, feedback_date FROM feedback_table WHERE rating < 3 AND feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback;
SELECT passenger_name, rating FROM PassengerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_id,feedback_text FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;

SELECT feedback_id, passenger_name, category_name FROM PassengerFeedback JOIN FeedbackLog ON PassengerFeedback.feedback_id = FeedbackLog.feedback_id JOIN FeedbackCategories ON FeedbackLog.category_id = FeedbackCategories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackLog WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback;
SELECT passenger_name, rating FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY passenger_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50;
SELECT log_id, submission_date FROM FeedbackLog ORDER BY submission_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT f.passenger_name, fc.category_name FROM PassengerFeedback f JOIN FeedbackLog fl ON f.feedback_id = fl.feedback_id JOIN FeedbackCategories fc ON fl.category_id = fc.category_id WHERE fc.category_name = 'Complaint';
SELECT * FROM passenger_feedback;
SELECT rating, comment FROM passenger_feedback WHERE passenger_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT passenger_name, email FROM passengers ORDER BY passenger_name ASC;
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM drivers WHERE vehicle_id = '09876543-210e-98b1-4567-894532109876';
SELECT rating_id, passenger_id, driver_id, rating FROM passenger_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM passengers;
SELECT passenger_name, email FROM passengers WHERE phone_number='1234567890';
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM drivers WHERE vehicle_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT rating FROM passenger_feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT passenger_id, driver_id, rating FROM passenger_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM PassengerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, feedback_text, rating FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM Passenger WHERE total_feedbacks > 10 ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Passenger WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM PassengerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT passenger_id, rating FROM PassengerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 AND feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT f.feedback_id, f.passenger_id, p.name, f.rating FROM PassengerFeedback f JOIN Passenger p ON f.passenger_id = p.passenger_id WHERE f.rating < 3 ORDER BY f.feedback_date ASC;

SELECT f.feedback_id, f.passenger_id, c.category_name FROM PassengerFeedback f JOIN PassengerFeedbackCategory pfc ON f.feedback_id = pfc.feedback_id JOIN FeedbackCategory c ON pfc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = 'Service' ORDER BY f.feedback_date DESC;
SELECT p.name, COUNT(f.feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM Passenger p LEFT JOIN PassengerFeedback f ON p.passenger_id = f.passenger_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING total_feedbacks > 3;
